original_text: The days will come when the bridegroom is taken away from them, and then they will fast in that day.
korean_text: 그러나 신랑을 빼앗길 날이 이르리니 그 날에는 금식할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: when the bridegroom is taken away from them
and then they will fast in that day.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때에 그들은 그 날에 금식할 것입니다.
